name: The Scent of Summer
description: This is a short story of a boy and girl in elementary school 6th grade in Japan. You can experience to go back home from school with a girlfriend who goes the same cram school in the early summer evening. Special things don't happen but you can being with a girlfriend in a sentimental atmosphere of dusk.
